column4: what's a good rational speed for cdrecord to burn an ubuntu iso from the command line
4x is always safe, even the most ancient of burners should manage it w/o wrecking the CD-ROM...
cool, thanks I had a CD that said it checked but I burned it in 29 seconds ... I seem to remember it taking 10 minutes before ....
best way to avoid that: avoid compiling your own kernels...
